tracks.track: PHA-4 (Pol II ChIP): Binding Sites: PHA4_POLII_StarvedL1
tracks.key: PHA-4 (Pol II ChIP): Binding Sites: PHA4_POLII_StarvedL1

metadata.shortInfo: Identification of Binding Regions for transcription factors in C. elegans (Snyder project, Snyder subgroup). General Description: We are identifying the DNA binding sites for 300 transcription factors in C. elegans. Each transcription factor gene is tagged with the same GFP fusion protein, permitting validation of the gene's correct spatio-temporal expression pattern in transgenic animals.  Chromatin immunoprecipitation on each strain is peformed using an anti-GFP antibody, and any bound DNA is deep-sequenced using Solexa GA2 technology.
metadata.citation:
Identification of Binding Regions for transcription factors in C. elegans (Snyder project, Snyder subgroup)

General Description

We are identifying the DNA binding sites for 300 transcription factors in C. elegans. Each transcription factor gene is tagged with the same GFP fusion protein, permitting validation of the gene's correct spatio-temporal expression pattern in transgenic animals. Chromatin immunoprecipitation on each strain is peformed using an anti-GFP antibody, and any bound DNA is deep-sequenced using Solexa GA2 technology.

Protocols

  1. Growth and isolation: Worm Growth and Harvest
  2. Sample preparation: Illumina Deep Sequencing, ChIP
  3. Data Analysis: Illumina Data Merging, Illumina Data Analysis, Peak Calling

Experimental Reagents

    Growth Conditions:
  1. Antibodies: RNA Polymerase II

Sample Details

  1. Animals/Lines: starved L1, fed L1, embryo
  2. External Links: GSM363863, GSM363861, GSM391296, GSM391299, GSM391297

Release Date: 2009-11-27

tracks.label: PHA-4 (Pol II ChIP): Binding Sites: PHA4_POLII_StarvedL1
